row.entry: This module can be used to modify the global saturation, give a tint to the image or to split tone it.

sect5.title: color board
sect5.para: For split toning drag the white dot to the desired highlight tint and then select a tint for shadows with the dark spot. For a simple global tint set both spots to the same color.

sect5.title: saturation
sect5.para: Use the saturation slider to correct the global saturation.
